page.title: 08CLUB
page.content: STRATHMARTINE WOMAN'S RURAL INSTITUTE THIS YEAR CELEBRATED ITI'S 36TH BIRTHDAY.IT HAS A MEMBERSHIP OF 80 WITH ABOUT 60 WOMEN ATTENDING EACH MEETING.THESE MEETINGS ARE HELD MONTHLY FROM AUTUMN TILL EARLY SUMMER. RECENTLY THE STRATHMARTINE W.R.I. COMPETED FOR THE CRAWFORD CUP.THIS IS A CHORAL COMPETITION OPEN TO W.R.I'S IN THE NORTH EAST OF SCOTLAND.THEY WERE ALSO VERY SUCCESSFUL OVER 10 OTHER GROUPS. THEIR PRESIDENT MRS PATE HAS HELD THAT OFFICE FOR A NUMBER OF YEARS AND IN THE PAST BEEN PRESIDENT OF THE ANGUS FEDIRATION.THE STRATHMARTINE WRI COMPETES WITH OTHER 'RURALS'IN ANGUS YEARLY FOR THE BABINGTON CUP.THIS TROPHY IS PRESENTED TO THE BEST RURAL WHO HAVE THE HIGHEST STANDARD OVERALL FOR PRODUCE,BAKING AND HANDICRAFTS.
